original_text: For as a young man marrieth a virgin, so shall thy sons marry thee: and as the bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride, so shall thy God rejoice over thee.
korean_text: 마치 청년이 처녀와 결혼함 같이 네 아들들이 너를 취하겠고 신랑이 신부를 기뻐함 같이 네 하나님이 너를 기뻐하시리라

sentences.original_text: For as a young man marrieth a virgin
so shall thy sons marry thee
and as the bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride
so shall thy God rejoice over thee
